Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=6.3 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.6 µM), S. aureus (MRSA) (MIC=12.5 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=100 µM).

Literature.Title: Identification and structure-activity relationship of an antimicrobial peptide of the palustrin-4 family isolated from the skin of the endangered frog Odorrana ishikawae.
Literature.Author: Iwakoshi-Ukena E, Okada G, Okimoto A, Fujii T, Sumida M, Ukena K.
